1.0.name: urn:scim:schemas:extension:enterprise:1.0
1.0.description: The following SCIM extension defines attributes commonly used in representing users that belong to, or act on behalf of a business or enterprise.

subAttributes.name: employeeNumber
subAttributes.description: Numeric or alphanumeric identifier assigned to a person, typically based on order of hire or association with an organization.

subAttributes.name: costCenter
subAttributes.description: Identifies the name of a cost center.

subAttributes.name: organization
subAttributes.description: Identifies the name of an organization.

subAttributes.name: division
subAttributes.description: Identifies the name of a division.

subAttributes.name: department
subAttributes.description: Identifies the name of a department.

subAttributes.name: manager
subAttributes.description: Numeric or alphanumeric identifier assigned to a person, typically based on order of hire or association with an organization.

subAttributes.name: managerId
subAttributes.description: The id of the SCIM resource representing the User's manager.

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: Identifies the name of a department.
